newsitem.title: HONG KONG: GZI Transport prices shares at HK$3.23 each in IPO.
newsitem.headline: GZI Transport prices shares at HK$3.23 each in IPO.

text.p: GZI Transport Ltd's 250 million new share issue is priced at HK$3.23 per share, falling at the higher end of a revised prospective price range of HK$3.00 to HK$3.25, an official of lead manager Peregrine Capital Ltd said.
GZI Transport, the spunoff infrastructure unit of China-backed Guangzhou Investment Co Ltd, had lifted its offer price from an initial range of HK$2.84 to HK$3.06 a share earlier this month.
The Peregrine official said the global offering portion of the issue was heavily oversubscribed.
GZI Transport's initial public offer (IPO) in Hong Kong is expected to run from January 21 to 24 and dealing in the shares is expected to begin on January 30.
Guangzhou Investment had said one free GZI Transport warrant would be attached to every five new GZI Tranpsort shares subscribed.
The public offer also includes a preferential offer to Guangzhou Investment shareholders on the basis of one GZI Transport share for every 52 Guangzhou Investment shares held.
GZI Transport has a total of six toll road projects mainly in southern China's Guangdong province.
